# 시뮬레이션 조건 함수

.scroll-output[

```{r}
makeCondition <- function(n_sample, cov_size, n_indi, cut_size, n_rep, 
                          full = T) {
  con_list <-
    crossing(n_sample, cov_size, n_indi, cut_size) %>%
    mutate(condition_number = row_number())

  if(full)
    con_list <- 
      crossing(con_list, n_rep = 1:n_rep) %>% 
      arrange(n_rep, condition_number)

  return(con_list)
}

condition_list <- 
  makeCondition(
    n_sample = c(100, 500), cov_size = c(0, 0.5), n_indi = c(3, 6), 
    cut_size = c(3,5,7), n_rep = 5, full = F)
```
